Introduction

Kim Gyu Vin is a South Korean singer originally under Yuehua Entertainment. In 2023, he competed in the hit survival show "Boys Planet," where he ended up ranking 7th place, earning his spot in the group ZEROBASEONE.

He made his official debut with ZEROBASEONE on July 10, 2023, under the management of WAKEONE.
